title: The Question:  Material Wealth? or Life? Where does your value lie? And the World answered, Life.
description:
Jason joins me to discuss what animates us.
The virus is unifying the world against a common enemy.
The world has chosen to value human life over material wealth.
How long will that agreement last? We must deal with the future as it unfolds.
Viewing the War Memorial in Canberra, Jason came to the conclusion that people are prepared to die for an idea, an abstract idea.

The world is intelligible to the human brain. Truth is discoverable.
Is natural selection selecting for predictive capacity for the best models of reality for that particular organism?
The Brain and Neuroscience video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p0_-7FmrDq8&t=1802s
Pertinent clip was at 28:00/

Axioms can only be demonstrated to be useful over time.
Look at your wants, desires and actions to see your actual belief system.

Questions about information entropy to be discussed in next video.
